18: All of the bins are empty.  Looking closely you can see that there

30: You are in a computer room.  It seems like most of the equipment has
31: been removed.  There is a VAX 11/780 in front of you, however, with
32: one of the cabinets wide open.  A sign on the front of the machine
33: says: This VAX is named 'pokey'.  To type on the console, use the
34: 'type' command.  The exit is to the east.
35: The panel lights are steady and motionless.
36: >put card into vax
37: As you put the CPU board in the computer, it immediately springs to life.
38: The lights start flashing, and the fans seem to startup.
